block.p: ANAHEIM ANGELS--Sent RHP Brett Hinchliffe outright to Edmonton of the PCL. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Recalled RHP Justin Speier from Buffalo of the International League. Optioned RHP Tim Drew to Buffalo. Promoted RHP J.D. Brammer from Akron of the Eastern League to Buffalo of the International League and LHP C.C. Sabathia from Kinston of the Carolina League to Akron. MINNESOTA TWINS--Sent CF Torii Hunter to their minor league camp. Recalled INF Jason Maxwell from Salt Lake of the PCL. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Released SS Kevin Stocker and RHP Dwight Gooden. Recalled INF Felix Martinez from Durham of the International League. Selected LHP Doug Creek from Durham.

FLORIDA MARLINS--Purchased the contract of RHP Reid Cornelius from Calgary of the PCL. Optioned the contract of RHP Joe Strong to Calgary. MONTREAL EXPOS--Called up C Charlie O'Brien from Harrisburg of the Eastern League. Placed LHP Matt Blank on the 15-day disabled list and RHP Scott Strickland on the 60-day disabled list.
CANTON CROCODILES--Named Alfredo Portela general manager. LONDON WEREWOLVES--Re-signed OF Rick Nadeau.
UTAH STARZZ--Releasing G Alli Bills and G Julie Krommenhoek.
FLORIDA SEA DRAGONS--Released G Carl Boyd.

CINCINNATI BENGALS--Released P Greg Mueller. NEW YORK JETS--Signed DT Jason Ferguson to a one-year contract and WR-KR Dwight Stone, WR Brandon Campbell and WR Windrell Hayes to contracts. Canadian Football League HAMILTON TIGER-CATS--Signed OL Benjamin French, DT George Massey and DT Jaton Jackson. MONTREAL ALOUETTES--Signed SB Harvey Stables to a two-year contract and RB Joe Aska and RB Markeith Cooper to one-year contracts. SASKATCHEWAN ROUGHRIDERS--Announced the retirement of DB Glenn Rogers Jr. Signed LB Matt Pederson.
ROANOKE STEAM--Added RB Rodrick Johnson to the roster.
ANAHEIM MIGHTY DUCKS--Acquired a 2001 fourth-round entry draft pick from the Columbus Blue Jackets for C Espen Knutsen.

AUBURN--Announced the resignation of Eugene Harris, men's assistant basketball coach, to take a position in athletic administration at the school. CALDWELL--Announced the resignation of Bob Costello, women's basketball coach and Jamie Galioto, baseball coach. Promoted women's assistant basketball coach Nicole Durnien-Amato to women's basketball coach. DUQUESNE--Announced the resignation of Kenya Hunter, men's assistant basketball coach, to become director of men's basketball operations at North Carolina State. HIGH POINT--Named Brett Reed men's assistant basketball coach. NYU--Named Tom Satran men's assistant basketball coach. NORTH CAROLINA STATE--Named Mark Phelps men's assistant basketball coach. PORTLAND--Named Brad Huse men's assistant basketball coach. Promoted restricted-earnings coach Kirk Crawford to full-time men's assistant basketball coach. RAMAPO--Announced the retirement of J. Hank Morano, men's assistant basketball coach, and the resignations of Frank Martiniuk, men's assistant basketball coach, and Lynne Odorico, women's assistant volleyball coach. ROBERT MORRIS--Named Michael Smith men's and women's track and field coach. STONEHILL--Promoted assistant director of athletics Cindy MacDonald to associate athletics director for internal affairs and compliance, effective July 1. WESTERN NEW ENGLAND--Named Erin Sullivan men's soccer coach.
